mapper.select:
SELECT DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, sum(production_qty) AS production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty, ( shipment_qty + inventories_qty ) / supplier_shipment_qty AS trace_ratio FROM ( SELECT DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, sum(shipment_qty) AS shipment_qty, inventories_qty FROM ( SELECT a.DateKey, a.supplier_eqacode, a.supplier_jdecode, a.supplier_name, a.manufacturer_eqa_code, a.manufacturer_name, a.sku_eqacode, a.sku_jdecode, a.sku_name, a.production_date, a.production_qty, a.UOM, a.supplier_shipment_qty, a.received_qty, a.shipment_qty, a.inventories_qty FROM cdm_fact_iqa_batch_traceability_master_data a
INNER JOIN edw_iqa_sqa_sku_relation eskr ON eskr.sku_jdecode = a.sku_jdecode INNER JOIN edw_eqa_user_role_mapping ourm ON REPLACE (ourm.rolename, ' ', '') = eskr.sqa_group_name
AND ourm.adpid = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.psid}
where
1=1 and
a.sku_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.skuName} and
a.manufacturer_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.manufacturerName} and
a.production_date = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.productionDate} and
a.rmi_sku_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.rmiSkuName} and
a.manufacturer_rmi_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.manufacturerRmiName} and
a.rmi_batch_no = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.rmiBatchNo} and
a.sku_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.productName} and
a.rest_brand = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.restBrand} and
a.production_date >= #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.startTime} and
a.production_date <= #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.endTime} and
GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty ) shipment_qty GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, inventories_qty, production_qty ) production_qty GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty ORDER BY production_date DESC

SELECT DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, sum(production_qty) AS production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty, ( shipment_qty + inventories_qty ) / supplier_shipment_qty AS trace_ratio FROM ( SELECT DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, sum(shipment_qty) AS shipment_qty, inventories_qty, batch_no FROM ( SELECT a.DateKey, a.supplier_eqacode, a.supplier_jdecode, a.supplier_name, a.manufacturer_eqa_code, a.manufacturer_name, a.sku_eqacode, a.sku_jdecode, a.sku_name, a.production_date, a.production_qty, a.UOM, a.supplier_shipment_qty, a.received_qty, a.shipment_qty, a.inventories_qty, a.store_code, a.batch_no FROM cdm_fact_iqa_batch_traceability_master_data a
INNER JOIN edw_iqa_sqa_sku_relation eskr ON eskr.sku_jdecode = a.sku_jdecode INNER JOIN edw_eqa_user_role_mapping ourm ON REPLACE (ourm.rolename, ' ', '') = eskr.sqa_group_name
AND ourm.adpid = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.psid}
where
1=1 and
a.sku_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.skuName} and
a.manufacturer_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.manufacturerName} and
a.production_date = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.productionDate} and
a.rmi_sku_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.rmiSkuName} and
a.manufacturer_rmi_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.manufacturerRmiName} and
a.rmi_batch_no = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.rmiBatchNo} and
a.sku_name = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.productName} and
a.rest_brand = #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.restBrand} and
a.production_date >= #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.startTime} and
a.production_date <= #{cdfactIqaBatchTraceabilityMasterData.endTime} and
GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty, store_code, batch_no ) shipment_qty GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, inventories_qty, production_qty, batch_no ) production_qty GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty ORDER BY production_date DESC limit #{startIndex},#{limit}

select count(*) from ( SELECT DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, sum(production_qty) AS production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty, ( shipment_qty + inventories_qty ) / supplier_shipment_qty AS trace_ratio FROM ( SELECT DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, sum(shipment_qty) AS shipment_qty, inventories_qty, batch_no FROM ( SELECT a.DateKey, a.supplier_eqacode, a.supplier_jdecode, a.supplier_name, a.manufacturer_eqa_code, a.manufacturer_name, a.sku_eqacode, a.sku_jdecode, a.sku_name, a.production_date, a.production_qty, a.UOM, a.supplier_shipment_qty, a.received_qty, a.shipment_qty, a.inventories_qty, a.store_code, a.batch_no FROM cdm_fact_iqa_batch_traceability_master_data a
INNER JOIN edw_iqa_sqa_sku_relation eskr ON eskr.sku_jdecode = a.sku_jdecode INNER JOIN edw_eqa_user_role_mapping ourm ON REPLACE(ourm.rolename,' ','') = eskr.sqa_group_name
AND ourm.adpid = #{psid}
where
1=1 and
a.sku_name = #{skuName} and
a.manufacturer_name = #{manufacturerName} and
a.production_date = #{productionDate} and
a.rmi_sku_name = #{rmiSkuName} and
a.manufacturer_rmi_name = #{manufacturerRmiName} and
a.rmi_batch_no = #{rmiBatchNo} and
a.sku_name = #{productName} and
a.rest_brand = #{restBrand} and
a.production_date >= #{startTime} and
a.production_date <= #{endTime} and
GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, production_qty, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty, store_code, batch_no ) shipment_qty GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, inventories_qty, production_qty, batch_no ) production_qty GROUP BY DateKey, supplier_eqacode, supplier_jdecode, supplier_name, manufacturer_eqa_code, manufacturer_name, sku_eqacode, sku_jdecode, sku_name, production_date, UOM, supplier_shipment_qty, received_qty, shipment_qty, inventories_qty )total
